name: mri_robust_register
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Inverse consistent registration of two volumes using robust and standard cost functions.

inputs.description: Input movable volume to be aligned to target.
inputs.name: Movable Volume

inputs.description: Input target volume.
inputs.name: Target Volume

inputs.description: Output registration (transform from mov to dst).
inputs.name: Output Registration

inputs.description: Set outlier sensitivity manually for robust cost functions. Higher values mean less sensitivity.
inputs.name: Outlier Sensitivity

inputs.description: Auto-detect good sensitivity for robust cost functions.
inputs.name: Automatic Sensitivity Detection

inputs.description: Output image: movable mapped and resampled at destination.
inputs.name: Mapped Movable

inputs.description: Output image: movable aligned to destination (no resampling, only adjusting header vox2ras).
inputs.name: Mapped Movable Header

inputs.description: Output weights (outlier probabilities) in destination space (0=regular,1=outlier).
inputs.name: Weights Output

inputs.description: Weights (outlier) map will be inverted (0=outlier), as in earlier versions.
inputs.name: Invert Weights Map

inputs.description: Estimate intensity scale factor.
inputs.name: Intensity Scale

inputs.description: Only perform intensity scaling (no transformation).
inputs.name: Intensity Scale Only

inputs.description: Output text file for iscale value.
inputs.name: Intensity Scale Output File

inputs.description: Initial input text file for iscale value.
inputs.name: Intensity Scale Input File

inputs.description: Find 3 parameter translation only.
inputs.name: Translation Only

inputs.description: Find 12 parameter affine transform.
inputs.name: Affine Transform

inputs.description: Use initial transform LTA on source.
inputs.name: Initial Transform File

inputs.description: Use moments for orientation initialization.
inputs.name: Initialize Orientation

inputs.description: Skip automatic transform initialization.
inputs.name: No Initial Transform

inputs.description: Output VOX2VOX LTA file.
inputs.name: Vox2Vox Output

inputs.description: Set cost function for registration.
inputs.name: Cost Function

inputs.description: With ROBENT: specify box radius for entropy computation.
inputs.name: Entropy Radius

inputs.description: With ROBENT: use better entropy computation that works on smaller boxes.
inputs.name: Entropy Correction

inputs.description: With ROBENT: use ball around voxel instead of box.
inputs.name: Entropy Ball

inputs.description: With ROBENT: write movable entropy image.
inputs.name: Entropy Movable File

inputs.description: With MI, NMI etc: set Powell tolerance.
inputs.name: Powell Tolerance

inputs.description: Register Sobel magnitude images.
inputs.name: Sobel Image Registration

inputs.description: Do not map to half way space.
inputs.name: No Symmetry Mapping

inputs.description: Maximum number of iterations on each resolution.
inputs.name: Maximum Iterations

inputs.description: With ROBENT: write target entropy image.
inputs.name: Entropy Destination File

inputs.description: Maximum number of iterations on highest resolution.
inputs.name: High Iterations Max

inputs.description: Stop iterations when transform update falls below specified RMS distance.
inputs.name: EPS Iterations

inputs.description: Process highest resolution only (no multiscale).
inputs.name: No Multiscale

inputs.description: Specify largest voxel dimension for gaussian pyramid.
inputs.name: Max Size

inputs.description: Specify smallest voxel dimension for gaussian pyramid.
inputs.name: Min Size

inputs.description: (Expert) sets maximal outlier limit for --satit.
inputs.name: Weight Limit

inputs.description: Subsample if dimension is greater than the specified value on all axes.
inputs.name: Subsample Dimension Limit

inputs.description: Convert images to float internally.
inputs.name: Convert to Float

inputs.description: Assume white background in MOV for padding.
inputs.name: White Background Movable

inputs.description: Assume white background in DST for padding.
inputs.name: White Background Destination

inputs.description: Convert inputs to UCHAR with rescale and histogram cropping.
inputs.name: Convert to UCHAR

inputs.description: Mask movable image with mask file.
inputs.name: Mask Movable

inputs.description: Mask destination image with mask file.
inputs.name: Mask Destination

inputs.description: Outputs half-way movable (resampled in halfway space).
inputs.name: Half Movable

inputs.description: Outputs half-way destination (resampled in halfway space).
inputs.name: Half Destination

inputs.description: Outputs half-way weights (resampled in halfway space).
inputs.name: Half Weights

inputs.description: Outputs transform from movable to half-way space.
inputs.name: Half Movable LTA

inputs.description: Outputs transform from destination to half-way space.
inputs.name: Half Destination LTA

inputs.description: Show debug output.
inputs.name: Debug Mode

inputs.description: Verbosity level: 0 (quiet), 1 (normal), 2 (detail).
inputs.name: Verbosity Level

output-files.description: Registration output file containing the transformation from movable to destination.
output-files.name: Registration Output

output-files.description: Movable volume mapped and resampled at destination.
output-files.name: Mapped Movable Output

output-files.description: Movable volume aligned to destination (header only).
output-files.name: Mapped Movable Header Output

output-files.description: Weights indicating outlier probabilities in destination space.
output-files.name: Weights Output File

output-files.description: Output text file containing the intensity scale value.
output-files.name: Intensity Scale Output File

output-files.description: Half-way weights resampled in halfway space.
output-files.name: Half Weights File

output-files.description: Transform output from movable to half-way space.
output-files.name: Half Movable LTA File

output-files.description: Transform output from destination to half-way space.
output-files.name: Half Destination LTA File

output-files.description: Movable entropy image for ROBENT cost function.
output-files.name: Movable Entropy Image

output-files.description: Target entropy image for ROBENT cost function.
output-files.name: Destination Entropy Image
